Optional aPosition

aPosition: function
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:24

A parametric function determining the positions of points in the grid.

umin <= u <= umax

vmin <= v <= vmax

default

(u: number, v: number) => u e1 + v e2

Type declaration

    • (u: number, v: number): VectorE3

    • Parameters

      • u: number
      • v: number

      Returns VectorE3

Optional drawMode

drawMode: DrawMode
  • Defined in visual/GridOptions.ts:43

Specifies the required Geometric Primitive Type. Implementations may choose the nearest type.

default

DrawMode.LINES

Optional offset

offset: VectorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.offset

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:38

Displacement (vector) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference location. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

default

0

Optional position

position: VectorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.position

Position (vector)

default

0

Optional tilt

tilt: SpinorE3

Inherited from VisualOptions.tilt

  • Defined in visual/VisualOptions.ts:57

Rotation (spinor) to be applied to the geometry at construction time to establish the reference orientation. This cannot be changed once the object has been created because it is burned-in to the vertex locations.

default

1
